tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.LightBlue> This server is in early development.</> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> If you need help ask in the Discord. </> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> Donate; it helps run the server.</> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> You can expect bugs!</> 



 <TextStyle.LightBlue> HERE ARE THE RULES:</> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> No Racism</> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> No Griefing</> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> No blocking off Obelisks</>

<TextStyle.Red> ➤</> <TextStyle.LightBlue>Press F2 to access the Shop.</> 
 <TextStyle.LightBlue> ➤ Trading is also available in the Shop</>
